p: Per composite sample, 60 g subsamples were taken for the analysis of abiotic and biotic soil characteristics. Moisture content, pH, organic matter (OM) content, total carbon (C) content, total nitrogen (N) content, and C:N ratio were determined. The total amount of C and N, determined with a composite sample from an invaded plot and an uninvaded plot per sampling site, was performed by BLGG AgroXpertus (Wageningen, The Netherlands).
